sentence.Network_en: The unexpectedness of my father's death meant that his affairs were not entirely in order.
sentence.Network_cn: 家父的猝然离世留下了尚未完全安排妥当的身后事。

sentence.Network_en: The sheer unexpectedness of it made my hair stir under my cap.
sentence.Network_cn: 这猝不及防的惊变,使我帽子下面的头发都竖起来.

sentence.Network_en: It is of unexpectedness , imitativeness, changeableness and it is just blindly following.
sentence.Network_cn: 青少年偏差行为具有突发性 、 仿性 、 变性和盲从性等特点.
